Installation¶

From Source¶

git clone git://github.com/jk0/pyhole.git
cd pyhole
./bin/pyhole
vi ~/.pyhole/pyhole.conf
./bin/pyhole

Python Package¶

pip install irc-pyhole
pyhole
vi ~/.pyhole/pyhole.conf
pyhole
